name: Rating Builder
author: redq

sections.description:
Rating builder supports any custom post type. You can build any type of rating with your WordPress comment. The plugin built with React.js.

The features are offered by this plugin

  • Multiple post type supported
  • Can be used in WooCommerce Product Rating.
  • Support Multiple Rating Parameter.
  • Supported with comment disabled.
  • Support Multiple Icon as Rating Icon.
  • You can specify Total Number of icons and post type to implement rating on that post.
  • Multilingual

Demo & Docs

Online Documentation

Check online demo for WordPress Rating Builder.

Our Portfilio

You can check our Portfolio from here.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.6.0 or greater
  • PHP version 5.4.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Reactive LITE, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type Reactive LITE and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our eCommerce plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our eCommerce plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
